Perceptor::

Perceptor avoided every puch, he was  blind and withhis experience it 
was an advantage.

"I'm Predacon" answered while he avoided the punchs

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron looked at the helpless prisoner. This wont be as much fun 
as I
> hoped, Megatron thought to himself. Their better when they are full 
of
> spirit, ah well. "Wildrider, release the Beastbox cassette". 
Wildrider
> let go of what he had in his hand. It transformed into his ape mode,
> rubbing his head. He then sniffed the air, and grunted. "I'm tired 
of
> being kicked around all the time." he said, looking at 
Perceptor. "NOW I
> DO THE KICKING" He yelled as he launched himself towards Perceptor,
> begining to rain down fists at the robot. "What is your alligience?"
> Megatron asked, with a hint of enjoyement in his voice.
